meanings.sent1: I love eating veggies with my dinner every day.
meanings.sent2: My mom always tells me to eat my veggies to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The veggies in the salad were having a dance party in my bowl.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like a sea of colorful veggies waving in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The farmer's market was overflowing with fresh, vibrant veggies.

meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word 'vegetables'
meanings.sent1: I need to buy some veggies for the stir-fry tonight.
meanings.sent2: She asked if I wanted any veggies in my sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The fridge was full of veggies, but I couldn't find any carrots.
meanings.sent4: His lunchbox was packed with all kinds of veggies, making it heavy.
meanings.sent5: The chef's specialty was a delicious soup made with various veggies.
